item.description:
Hi all,

On Saturday, April 23rd, a big group of us will be going to Salsa Dancing at the Mojitos Lounge and I wanted to share this with the Asian Professional Group as well, as I have setup a special Guest List for us($5 only, including Beginner's Lessons), and all of you are more than welcome to join us.

Mojitos Lounge
48 Winter Street
Boston, MA 02108

Beginner Salsa Lessons 9pm - 10pm (No additional Cost)

Social Dancing 10pm - 2am

I have a Guest List set up with the Owner and it'll be under "Meetup" and it will only be $5. The Guest List closes at 11pm, so if you come any time later, it will be the normal cover charge of $10. No exceptions unfortunately.

Dress Code: No Athletic Attire (No baseball caps, jerseys, sneakers).

Music: Primarily Salsa and Latin Music with a little bit of Reggaetone / Top 40 / Hip Hop mixed in between.

Xiao Long will be at Mojito's Lounge at 9pm and most of us will be waiting upstairs, taking the Beginner's Lessons.

I've been here a good number of times and have always had fun, so hopefully all of you can join in on the fun! :]
item.why: Let's go dance and have some fun! :]

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Salsa Dancing Part II (Mojitos Lounge)
